entry.title: Ukrainians Urged to Ration Electricity Use as Russian Missiles Target Energy Infrastructure
entry.content: Moscow is seeking to erode the resilience of Ukrainian civilians even as the Kremlin attempts to regain the initiative against Kyiv on the battlefield.

entry.title: India's Diwali Spending Season Shows a Lingering Pandemic Divide
entry.content: Retail sales in India are expected to rise to around $18 billion this festival season, but discretionary spending among consumers is divided between the rich and poor.
